definition: mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Looks that last are a hallmark of Bang & Olufsen.
sentences.chinese: 看起来，最后是一个标志性的爆炸和Olufsen。

sentences.english: Daniel, the Yi Gate Tower can be regarded as Longmen's landmark structure.
sentences.chinese: 大牛，这义门可以说是龙门镇的标志性建筑了。

sentences.english: Creative bedding set inspired by the iconic video game console.
sentences.chinese: 受到标志性的视频游戏机所启发的创意床上用品。

sentences.english: What iconic brands come to mind when you look around your space?
sentences.chinese: 看看你周围的空间，你会想到哪些标志性品牌呢？

sentences.english: Speed is vital to him. Spontaneity is more than ever the hallmark of good speaking.
sentences.chinese: 出口成章现已成为优秀演讲的标志性特征。

sentences.english: Perhaps the only thing that`s recognizable is his signature hairstyle.
sentences.chinese: 或许唯一能勾起回忆的就是他那标志性的发型。

sentences.english: Problems is house-building and their countermeasures are analysed and studied in detail…
sentences.chinese: 最后提出住房建设是奔小康的标志性工程。

sentences.english: The super high-rise New Times plaza structure is the symbol building in Shekou, Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 超高层建筑新时代广场是深圳蛇口的标志性建筑。

sentences.english: Pumpkins are also a symbol of Halloween.
sentences.chinese: 南瓜也是万圣节的标志性象征。

sentences.english: It came to a conclution that serum CHE was a sign of organophosphorus toxicosis.
sentences.chinese: 因此，血清CHE是有机磷中毒的标志性酶类。

sentences.english: This tower is a landmark piece of architecture in Fuliang town.
sentences.chinese: 这座塔就是古代浮梁县的标志性建筑。

sentences.english: Every generation has its life-defining moments.
sentences.chinese: 每一代人都有其标志性的历史时刻。

sentences.english: Even a Starbucks on Madison Avenue didn't open.
sentences.chinese: 麦迪逊小道上标志性的星巴克都罕有地打烊收歇。

sentences.english: The Bank of China Tower is over there.
sentences.chinese: 中银大厦是香港的标志性建筑之一。

sentences.english: He had shaved his signature beard and moustache.
sentences.chinese: 当时他已经刮去了他标志性的大胡子和八字须。

sentences.english: Red-tile roofs shaded in trees are a scenic feature of Qingdao.
sentences.chinese: 红瓦绿树，是青岛的标志性景观。

definition: the brush stroke that dots in the eyes (idiom); fig. to add the vital finishing touch/the crucial point that brings the subject to life/a few words to clinch the point
lit. to fly one's banner on a solitary tree (idiom); fig. to act as a loner/to stand out/to develop one's own school/to have attitude of one's own
ample/complete/hundred percent/a pure shade (of some color)
having a unique or distinctive style
